tool_description: The Diablo 4 API offers the Diablo IV news, gameplays, guides, top players, and other information.
title: Diablo4 Smartable

api_list.name: GetGames
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://diablo4-smartable.p.rapidapi.com/games/page/{page}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "diablo4-smartable.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
